docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 18.--Telephone service between Buenos Aires and New York wil operate until midnight, New York Time, for the exchange of telephone greetings during the holiday season.

headline.main: NOTABLE SPANIARDS 'CONFESS' REBELLION; Thousands Sign Mass Manifesto, Including Publicists and a Leading Army General.QUIET THROUGHOUT NATIONTroops Off Streets in ChiefCities--Valencia Angeredby Legion's Presence. Signers of Manifesto. NOTABLE SPANIARDS 'CONFESS' REBELLION Martial Law May End at New Year. Legionaires Anger Valencia. Franco Would Go to Argentina. Uruguay Aids Franco. Indicates Socialist Aid.

docs.snippet: THE agricultural crisis is not confined to any one country  or any group of countries; it is universal. Canada suffers as much as Poland, and the French farmer complains along with the Australian. Everywhere the price of grain has fallen below the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE agricultural crisis is not confined to any one country or any group of countries; it is universal. Canada suffers as much as Poland, and the French farmer complains along with the Australian. Everywhere the price of grain has fallen below the cost of production.

headline.main: TOO MUCH WHEAT: A GREAT WORLD DILEMMA; A Vast Increase in Output of Four Countries, Canada, United States, Argentina, Australia Has Caused Amazing Overproduction--32 Per Cent More of Wheat Against 10 Per Cent More of Population Per Capita Consumption. Key to the Crisis. The Two Europes. The Agricultural Region. Production and Demand. Effect on Exportation. Foreign Competition. The Warsaw Conference. Growth and Surplus. Fertile Field for Dissension. Three Years' Accumulation.
